publicationStmt.p: Distributed by Digital Scholarship Services at Lafayette College

lg.l: 1···Says my Unckle I pray you discover
What hath been the Cause of your Woes
That you whine & you pine like a Lover
J've seen Molley Mogg of the Rose
O Nephew your Griefe is but folly
in Town you may have better progue
Half a Crown there will get you a Molley
A Molley much better than Mogg────
2···The Schoule Boys delight is a play day
The Masters delight is to Flog
The Milk maids delight is on May day
But mine is in Sweet Molly Mog────
Willa'wisp sets the traveler a gading
Thro ditch & through Quagmire & bog
but no sight can Ere Set me a mading
Like the Eyes of my Sweet Molly Mog────
3···For Guineas in other mens britches
Your Gamesters will Palme & Will Cog
But J envy them none of their Riches
So J can Palme my Sweet Molly Mog
J know yt by Witts tis recited────
That Women at best are a Clog
but J am not so easily affrighted
for Loving of my Sweet Molly Mog
4···Who follows all Ladys of Pleasure
in Pleasure is counted a Hog
all their Sex cannot give so good measure
of Joys as my Sweet Molly Mog
The Heart when half wounded is Chainging
It here and their leaps like a frog
But my Heart it can never be ranging
Tis so fixed upon Sweet Molly Mog
5···J find I am in Love to distraction
my Sences quite lost in a fog
and nothing can give Satisfaction
Like thinking of my Sweet Molly Mog
A Letter when I am Indyting
comes Cupid and gives me a Jogg
Then I Scrible all my paper with Wrighting
Of nothing but my Sweet Molly Mogg
6···Jf J could not give up the three Graces
I wish I was hanged like a dog
And at Court all the drawing room faces
For a Glimps of my Sweet Molly Mog
Their faces want Nature & Spirit
And seem as cut out of a Log
Juno Venus & Palls's merit
Unite in my Sweet Molly Mog
7···Were Virgil alive with his Phyllis
And Writeing another Ecologue
Both his Phyllis and fare Amarillis
He'd give them for my Sweet Molly Mog
When She Smiles on he Guests like a Liquor
Then jealousy sets me agogg
To be sure she's a bit for the Vicar
So J shall lose my Sweet Molly MogY29-625A
